conversation.content: It's nice to finally have a chance to talk. Is there something on your mind that you've been wanting to share, or is this just a casual hello?

That can be really tough. It sounds like this breakup is still pretty fresh for you. What does this bring up for you - is it more about missing the person, or are you relieved that the relationship has ended?
no feel so sad and angry at the same time

It sounds like you're experiencing a really intense mix of emotions right now. The sadness and anger can be overwhelming, especially when they're happening at the same time. What do you think is fueling the anger part of it - is it more about the situation with your ex, or is it also about how you're feeling about yourself right now?
